title: Angels with Even Filthier Souls
description: In the sequel to Angels with Filthy Souls, Christmas is ruined as mob boss Johnny suspects his dame of smooching his brother… and everybody else.
quote: I believe you but my tommy gun don’t.
parent: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
altHero: mob boss Johnny in a tuxedo wields a tommy gun
alt1: a sharply dressed woman enters a room
alt4: Johnny pulls out his gun and starts shooting
